job_details.experience_required: Relevant years' experience in application support including incident and change management.
job_details.degree_required: Professional qualifications: candidate should be qualified in IT, SAP or have equivalent work experience.

jd: From: Nitish, epeopletech nitish@epeopletech.com Reply to: nitish@epeopletech.com Hi,Greetings!!We have an urgent opening with “SAP AMS Project Manager” and I have sent you job description, please go through it and let me know your comfort with it and also send me your updated resume ASAP Job Title: SAP AMS Project ManagerLocation: 100% Remote Duration: Long Term Contract What will you be doing?* Leadership and direction of the SAP and Business Application global team which provides support globally to all users across 20+ geographical locations* Management of software and consulting partners to ensure high levels of support and systems evolutions* Collaborate with senior business stakeholders to align business strategy with long term technology opportunities to maximise business benefits* Oversee analysis & interpretation of break fix ticket trends - including delivery of fixes in conjunction with our outsourced support providers* Support wider team with the translation of business requirements and manage the expectations of the business where appropriate* Accountable for adherence to security and architectural standards related systems, processes, and services* Maintain the integrity of the development, test and production environments associated with each application* Participate in system audits and manage regular system monitoringWhat experience would we like you to have?* Full SAP project life cycle implementation experience* Professional qualifications: candidate should be qualified in IT, SAP or have equivalent work experience.* Relevant years' experience in application support including incident and change management.* Must have deep SAP experience, working within a SAP support team with at least 2 SAP Implementation Lifecycles.* Broad knowledge of software application architecture.* Extensive Leadership experience of mid to large teams of both onshore and offshore, internal, and external teams.* Customer and solution focused service delivery skills.* Strong problem-solving capability.* Sound understanding of the underlying IT and SAP infrastructure required to support and enable effective use of software applications.* Experience of application deployment in a cloud environment desirable.* Experience in creation and maintenance of documentation, eg technical/development specifications, Configuration rationale, Test cases.* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies would be an advantage.* Strong interpersonal and communication skills.* Good organisational skills and smart working methods.* Presents self in a professional manner and works well under pressure.* Must be able to work with and advise stakeholders at a Senior Level across a global organisation. Thanks and Regards,Nitish KumarePeople Technologies Inc255 Baldwin Road, Suite 205,Parsippany, NJ 07054Ph # 973-658-5959*118Email- nitish@epeopletech.comLinkedin- https://www.linkedin.com/in/nitish-kumar-2b5635259/http://www.epeopletech.com
